message:
i want to start developing games using haxe nme. anyone can help me start ? because it is hard to find tutorials for that.
Thanks in advance :)

data.message:
What is exactly your problem ? 
1. You can find tutorials here at their website. http://www.nme.io/developer/tutorials/
2. You need to know the basics of Game Programming, so try to read any textbook that talks about game loops, finite state machines, basic AI..etc. 
3. The library itself will just give you ways to load graphics, get key handlers, play sound,..etc. You then need to load sprite animations, write some physics using another library like Box2D.

good my problem is the website of nme itself, they don't have a documentation and i found it hard to start, instead of the documentation i am searching for good tutorials and the tutorials on their site are so weak :/

You do not need any other tutorials to start with. They have all the information in their website to write a full game. First try to load a bitmap, then read their tutorials about key handlers, play sound. From that point you can write a Pong game so easily. Just add some basic vector reflections and that's all.  You need to extend their library for having more advanced concepts like Particle Systems,..etc.

thank you very much for your help :) 
ok i am going to start developing games for smart phones, any resources can help me to collect the basics ?

You need to read few chapters from
Tricks of Windows Game Programming Gurus, Andre' LaMothe, Stay away from the chapters on windows programming, DirectX, They are outdated. I was mentored by the Author for years till now, and it's really a great book. 
There are a lot of books that talk about Android Game Programming, iOS,..etc. Try also to read them, just get the basic concepts like I said above.
